column3: ~(don't merge this yet, I need to drop the last commit 4294b2f which should produce the error)~\n\nProof that Travis indeed catches this: https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/650359000#L2713
Ah! But we are using `-Werror=whatever` which selectively turns only some warnings into errors. Sorry for the noise above.\n\nACK c98c26e.

Thanks for working on this! I think we're currently somewhat underutilising the help we can get from compilers in the form of compiler diagnostics to prevent mistakes and this PR brings us in the right direction :)

ACK c98c26ee992f204b17bf17d271512b36c40ad8c5
